traits.name: Death Burst
entries: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2 (1d4 damage) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath {@recharge}
entries: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
headerEntries: The mephit can innately cast {@spell blur}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
